thread.title: Turkish national tells Nigel Farage: The UK must TIGHTEN BORDERS to protect British values
thread.title_full: Turkish national tells Nigel Farage: The UK must TIGHTEN BORDERS to protect British values

title: Turkish national tells Nigel Farage: The UK must TIGHTEN BORDERS to protect British values
text:
You have the right to raise the concern about controlling our borders Izzet, Turkish national 
“You have the right to raise the concern about controlling our borders,” Izzet told the Ukip MEP. 
“It’s not only for the security concerns, it will also help improve our life standards in the UK.” 
The comments led Mr Farage to ask the LBC caller whether there were “too many” people coming to live in the UK now. LBC Izzet told Nigel Farage immigration had had a "negative" effect on Britain 
Izzet responded: “Yes I do - I came to this country 15 years ago from Turkey as a businessman and I can see a big difference in the UK. 
“I can see a big change in a negative way in the UK and our lifestyle, for example; keeping British [values]. 
“Compared to 15 years ago the standard is not the same as before. We have a right to control our borders.” EPA Izzet told Nigel Farage he would not support a Trump-style travel ban 
However, the Turkish national was hastened to add he would not support a travel ban in the UK similar to the one implemented by Donald Trump. 
The President has temporarily barred citizens from seven mainly Muslim countries entering the US after signing an executive order on Saturday. 
Izzet criticised Mr Trump’s legislation for “discriminating against people based on their race”. 
“I don’t think Donald Trump is making the right decision,” he said. Europe in Crisis
